author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves connecting with trusted communities to share information, resources, and best practices related to incident response and cybersecurity. Engaging with trusted communities can enhance the organization's ability to respond to incidents by leveraging collective knowledge and experiences. This includes participating in forums, sharing threat intelligence, and collaborating on incident response strategies with other organizations and experts in the field.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.

title: Connect with Trusted Communities

references.name: NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 2: Incident Response Preparation
SANS: Incident Response Team Development and Preparation
